verses.roman:
kimvā, 'sarva-lakṣmī'--kṛṣṇera ṣaḍ-vidha aiśvarya
tāṅra adhiṣṭhātrī śakti--sarva-śakti-varya

synonyms: kimvā—or; sarva-lakṣmī—the word sarva-lakṣmī; kṛṣṇera—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; ṣaṭ-vidha—six kinds; aiśvarya—opulences; tāṅra—of Him; adhiṣṭhātrī—chief; śakti—energy; sarva-śakti—of all energies; varya—the best.
translation: Or "sarva-lakṣmī" indicates that She fully represents the six opulences of Kṛṣṇa. Therefore She is the supreme energy of Lord Kṛṣṇa.
